action_item: Users & Roles - Personalize the application settings for user experience.
notes: Focus on customizing the landing page and inbox for efficiency.

action_item: Users & Roles - Change the main login password for security.
notes: Follow the steps to change the password from the settings tab.

action_item: Users & Roles - Update the eSignature ID for additional security.
notes: Validate current ID before creating a new eSignature ID.

action_item: Users & Roles - Change the visual signature for documents.
notes: Validate eSignature ID to access the signature drawing screen.

action_item: Reports - Customize clinical document templates using CCDA standards.
notes: Select and order sections of patient charts for summaries.
